inclusion.criterion: major criteria and one minor criterion or at least three minor criteria
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: monoclonal protein present, less than major criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: decrease in uninvolved immunoglobulins: immunoglobulin A (IgA) > 2 g/dl
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: eastern cooperative oncology group (ecog) performance status <3
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ability to understand and the willingness to sign a written informed consent document
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients may not be receiving any other investigational agents
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of allergic reactions attributed to compounds of similar chemical or biologic composition to bortezomib, melphalan, or other agents used in the study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: uncontrolled intercurrent illness including, but not limited to, ongoing or active infection, symptomatic congestive heart failure, unstable angina pectoris, cardiac arrhythmia, or psychiatric illness/social situations that would limit compliance with study requirements
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: patients with immune deficiency are at increased risk of lethal infections when treated with marrow-suppressive therapy. therefore, hiv-positive patients receiving combination anti-retroviral therapy are excluded from the study because of possible pharmacokinetic interactions with bortezomib or other agents administered during the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma, recurrent disease, and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and was recently treated with pamidronate, calcitonin, and dialysis.
